summary: This is an email chain from September 2020 regarding the preparation of discovery materials for Ghislaine Maxwell's defense. It discusses the contents of a hard drive to be sent to Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), specifying which documents should be omitted due to being labeled 'HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL'.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant for whom discovery materials are being prepared. The email discusses sending a hard drive to her at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

events.title: Preparation of Discovery for Maxwell
events.description: Email correspondence finalizing the contents of a hard drive containing discovery materials to be sent to Ghislaine Maxwell at MDC, with instructions to omit certain highly confidential documents.

events.title: Discovery Material Review
events.description: Internal email discussing the preparation of discovery materials to be sent to MDC in separate envelopes and inquiring about a third round discovery letter.

events.title: Defense Request for Consolidated Discovery
events.description: Email stating the defense's request that the drive sent to Maxwell at MDC include all previously produced discovery materials consolidated onto one drive, with specific exclusions.

keyFacts: Discovery materials were being prepared for Ghislaine Maxwell while she was held at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in September 2020.
The defense requested that all discovery produced thus far be consolidated onto a single hard drive for Maxwell.
Specific document ranges (e.g., SDNY_GM_00166247 through SDNY_GM_00166273) were to be omitted from Maxwell's drive as they were in folders labeled 'HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL'.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing, multi-round discovery process in Maxwell's case.
